price: Dan sungguh, aku khawatir terhadap kerabatku sepeninggalku, padahal istriku seorang yang mandul, maka anugerahilah aku seorang anak dari sisi-Mu,
arabic: وَإِنِّي خِفۡتُ ٱلۡمَوَٰلِيَ مِن وَرَآءِي وَكَانَتِ ٱمۡرَأَتِي عَاقِرٗا فَهَبۡ لِي مِن لَّدُنكَ وَلِيّٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-innī khif'tu al-mawāliya min warāī wakānati im'ra-atī ʿāqiran fahab lī min ladunka waliyyan
